comments: She is the best teacher that I have ever had. She is well respected in her field and chooses readings that are both interesting and relevant. She is an amazing person and will always be available to help you outside of class as well as give feedback. She is one of the best teachers at Chapman and students will go back to her for years.

comments: Steph is a great professor who uses wit and humor to teach broad concepts and makes them easy to understand. She is very easy to get along with and you will enjoy her class. Just make sure you keep up with the reading (a few assigned books but the reading isn\'t too heavy) to be ready for the pop quizzes.

comments: Two papers. Very specific grader. Was not doing well in the class but gave me the opportunity to do well. Went from a D to a B on the final paper and extra credit.

comments: Amazing professor. HIGHLY recommend. You read 4 books throughout the semester. You must read the books. She gives quizzes about 2 times a week. Just read, go and see her if you need help. She\'s amazing.

comments: I love this professor. She\'s super nice and helpful. Just make sure you participate and speak in class, or else it\'ll hurt your grade later. You have to read and you have to go to class because she gives quizzes almost every day, but I love this class. It\'s a great GE and she\'s a great professor. Highly recommend !

comments: Stephanie is the bomb. Her class is challenging, but she makes it so worth it. The content is interesting and she is just amazing at what she does. She truly cares about her work and knows that most people take her class as a GE, so she doesn\'t try to shove Anthropology down your throat, but rather teach you about the world around you. LOVE HER

stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  GET READY TO READ  RESPECTED
comments: There is a decent amount of reading for the class (which you should do considering there is no other homework) and a couple of papers. The class is easy, interesting, and I got a lot out of it.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: I took this course for my artistic inquiry GE and although Stephanie is very engaging and the course material is very interesting it is NOT an easy A. On average there is about 80 pages of reading a week and you are quizzed on 1 thing out of these 80 pages, which is difficult because there is so much information. No tests though, just two essays.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  RESPECTED  INSPIRATIONAL
comments: Uh, we just had teacher evals and i wrote in all caps: STEPHANIE IS BAE3, because for real, she is. Do the readings, pay attention, gather all the wisdom you can from this woman because she is a gem. She will challenge your views and you\'ll be all, "wow, society is weird but cool and I guess pretty much everything is a social construct."

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Expects a lot from students, so if you\'re kinda dumb try not to be. Do the readings and you\'ll be fine. She\'ll treat you like an adult, which I don\'t think a lot of people are use to, but she\'s not out to get you. Visit her during office hours and she\'ll help you out, otherwise, if you don\'t care about the class you\'re gonna have a bad time.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Obvi Steph is the best teacher in Soc department, if not one of the best Chapman has. Fabulously smart, but able to communicate with students, which is a rare talent. Engaging, hilarious, dedicated, will work so hard FOR you if you work for her. Dedicated until the end... and a generally nice, kind, SUPER COOL person

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: BEST CLASS AT CHAPMAN. HANDS DOWN. I learned so much from her, and really got to bond. I\'m actually friends with her now from taking this extremely personalized class. There were only 13 students in the class, so she definitely has time to help you out with anything you need!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Make sure you do the readings. She gives reading quizzes basically once a week, and that\'s how she tracks attendance. She\'s always available tor extra help, and she\'s definitely the BEST Anthropology professor there is. The class is hard at the beginning, but it gets much better.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She is SUPER amazing. Lots of quizzes but simple if you do the reading. They are just to make sure you understand everything. She makes you think. If you need any help she will try to make everything more clear for you. She may seem a little rough at first but she is very sweet and funny after you know her! Take her classes; you will love Anthro!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (8)  Respected (6)  Hilarious (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Concerning the students\' engagement and growth, she is probably Chapman sociology\'s most dedicated faculty member. If you\'re a dumb person, though, you won\'t like her. And if you don\'t like her, it\'s probably because you\'re dumb.

Be prepared for a lot of reading/quizzes. Her class is completely different from other sections of Anth 102.
